alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 15 at 3:26AM MDT until March 16 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow. Total snow accumulations between 8 and 12 inches, mainly on west-facing slopes. * WHERE...Absaroka/Beartooth Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Recreation in the high country could be impacted by heavy accumulating snow and local whiteout conditions. Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusts 30 to 40 mph expected through the warning period. This could cause dangerous whiteout conditions at times. The heaviest snow is expected through tonight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
